resources.string: The goal is to fill up all of the squares, using the pieces given. (Swipe to the right)
The pieces can be resized by multiplying the length of each segment by 1.5, 2, 2.5, 3, etc. For example:

Difficulty Easy starts off with the first two pieces done, difficulty Medium starts off with the first piece done, and difficulty Hard starts with a blank grid. Hard is recommended for 5x5, medium is recommended for 6x6, and easy is recommended for 7x7.

When you use a piece, that piece at the bottom will appear red to let you know it has been used. \n \n Holding down a piece at the bottom will remove it from the grid, and holding down the white C will clear the grid.
